description: Here's how to photograph the Aug. 21 total solar eclipse with a smartphone.
maintext: You don't have to be a professional photographer with expensive equipment to take an awe-inspiring image of the total solar eclipse on August 21.Here are some tips on how to use a filter and the correct settings to get the best image on your smartphone, according to Accuweather.
title: Photographing the total solar eclipse with a smartphone
